title: Week 3 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Giants make the switch to Daniel Jones
itunes:title: Week 3 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Giants make the switch to Daniel Jones
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in the Stage 5 set alongside Matt "Money" Smith and Handsome Hank. The guys quickly get into the 10 Foot Pole edition of Zaxby's Fresh Takes revolving around Dak Prescott, the 2004 QB class and Josh Allen (4:56). Next up, we listen to some very funny voicemails from producer Kent Brown's mom dealing with Big Ben's injury and a spider inside her home (20:40). Then the trio discusses the Giants benching Eil Manning in favor of Daniel Jones, who Eddie Spaghetti met on Draft night (25:30). Lastly, the group rounds out the show with their Week 3 Red Challenge Flag picks (38:47)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
